name: Apocalypse Hotel - The Post-Apocalyptic Hotel Simulator!
description: Can you run a successful hotel even though the world has ended? Repair, renovate, and decorate the ‘Apocalypse Hotel’ while fending off zombies, mutants and the alien Gogfang!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000, Nvidia GeForce 8000, ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000, Nvidia GeForce 8000, ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I'm extremely disappointed in this game. Oh, it's fun. When it works. But it often crashes espiceally since the last update and the developer has no responded to anyones complaints. I've past the point where I personally could get my money back a long time ago. So warning about this before anyone else wastes their money.
Was this even playtested? It crashes every few minutes. It's garbage.
Really wanted to enjoy the game but the game has way to many bugs.
